body_html:
The line looks as follows: torch.pow(np.e, log_data). Using torch.exp fixed the problem.
I got the following message when using torch.pow:

Traceback (most recent call last):
File "/../TestPyTorch.py", line 135, in
loss.backward()
File "/home/dries/.local/lib/python3.5/site-packages/torch/tensor.py", line 93, in backward
torch.autograd.backward(self, gradient, retain_graph, create_graph)
File "/home/dries/.local/lib/python3.5/site-packages/torch/autograd/init.py", line 90, in backward
allow_unreachable=True) # allow_unreachable flag
RuntimeError: the derivative for pow is not implemented

body:
The line looks as follows: torch.pow(np.e, log_data). Using torch.exp fixed the problem.
I got the following message when using torch.pow:

Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/../TestPyTorch.py", line 135, in <module>
    loss.backward()
  File "/home/dries/.local/lib/python3.5/site-packages/torch/tensor.py", line 93, in backward
    torch.autograd.backward(self, gradient, retain_graph, create_graph)
  File "/home/dries/.local/lib/python3.5/site-packages/torch/autograd/__init__.py", line 90, in backward
    allow_unreachable=True)  # allow_unreachable flag
RuntimeError: the derivative for pow is not implemented
